title: Needed: Nuremberg Trials for the Vaccine Advocates
cleaned_text:
This video on the origin of Covid-19 was censored by Twitter. prior to Elon Musk. The US Government is responsible for the creation of Covid-19. Covid allegedly infected 658 million and killed 6.7 million because of lack of treatment. The Nazi holocaust allegedly murdered 6 million Jews. We need Nuremberg style Covid trials for Fauci, Bill Gates, Pfizer, NIH, CDC, Biden, Twitter, CNN, NPR, NYT, FDA.

There would be many more defendants, but they killed themselves by taking the Covid shot in order to prove how safe it is.
